<?php
    if (isset($_COOKIE['stamp'])) {
        if ($_COOKIE['stamp'] == sha1($_COOKIE['data'] . 'SECRETKEY')) {
            echo "Validated!\n";
        } else {
            echo "<blink>Not validated</blink>";
        }
    } else {
        $_COOKIE['data'] = '00110100011';
        $_COOKIE['stamp'] = sha1($_COOKIE['data'] . 'SECRETKEY');
    }
?>
